statements: SELECT user_id, notification_preferences, language_settings FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, language_settings, notification_preferences FROM user_preferences;
SELECT notification_preferences, user_id, language_settings FROM user_preferences;
SELECT notification_preferences, language_settings, user_id FROM user_preferences;
SELECT language_settings, user_id, notification_preferences FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, language_settings, notification_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT language_settings, notification_preferences, user_id FROM user_preferences WHERE language_settings = 'english';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_preferences->>'email' = 'true';
SELECT JSONB_ARRAY_ELEMENTS(notification_preferences->'channels') AS channel FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, notification_preferences -> 'channels' AS channels FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, notification_pref FROM user_preferences;
SELECT language_setting FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT notification_message, notification_time FROM notification_history;
SELECT user_id, notification_message, notification_time FROM notification_history WHERE notification_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_pref = true;
SELECT user_id, language_setting FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT notification_id, notification_message FROM notification_history WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_message, notification_time FROM notification_history WHERE notification_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, language_setting FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM notification_history WHERE notification_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01');
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, notification_preference FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_type, notification_message FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'email';
SELECT language_name FROM language_settings WHERE language_code = 'en';
SELECT user_id, notification_preference, language_setting FROM user_preferences JOIN language_settings ON user_preferences.language_setting = language_settings.language_code ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification_type, notification_message FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, language_code FROM user_preferences JOIN language_settings ON user_preferences.language_setting = language_settings.language_name;
SELECT notification_type, COUNT(*) AS num_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY notification_type HAVING num_notifications > 5;
SELECT user_id, notification_type FROM user_preferences JOIN notifications ON user_preferences.notification_preference = notifications.notification_type;
SELECT user_id, notification_preferences FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM notification_preferences WHERE enable_emails = true;
SELECT language_code, language_name FROM language_settings ORDER BY language_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode_enabled, timezone_offset FROM user_settings WHERE timezone_offset >= 0;

SELECT user_id, language_settings.language_name AS preferred_language, user_preferences.notification_preferences AS prefs FROM user_preferences JOIN language_settings ON language_settings.language_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences JOIN notification_preferences ON user_preferences.user_id = notification_preferences.user_id
SELECT user_id, language_settings FROM user_preferences
SELECT notification_id, user_id, enable_emails FROM notification_preferences WHERE enable_sms = true
SELECT language_code, language_name FROM language_settings WHERE language_id > 2 ORDER BY language_code DESC
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 100 AND language_settings = 'English'
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, language_settings FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, email_notifications FROM notification_preferences WHERE email_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, dark_mode FROM theme_settings WHERE dark_mode = FALSE;
SELECT user_id, timezone FROM timezone_settings ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_preferences FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT id, user_id, email_notifications, sms_notifications FROM notification_preferences WHERE email_notifications = TRUE;
SELECT id, user_id, language_code FROM language_settings ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, dark_mode FROM theme_settings WHERE dark_mode IS TRUE;
SELECT id, user_id, timezone FROM timezone_settings WHERE timezone = 'GMT+5' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
